task: Record a USD 15 lunch expense at a nearby café.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when the lunch expense is successfully recorded in the app with all relevant details filled in.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has resource_id "adder"
Open the app again because the previous action led to closing the app

After touching the button with resource_id "adder," a new button with text "Fri, Oct 31" appeared on the screen, along with several additional buttons and widgets such as "Play Store," "Gmail," and "Photos." The previous textview indicating "還沒有資料喔~" and other financial summary widgets are no longer visible, suggesting a shift to a different interface or functionality.
Open the app again because the previous action led to closing the app

After pressing the "BACK" button, the current screen now displays a text view with the message "還沒有資料喔~" indicating that no data is available, along with several buttons and text views related to financial tracking, which were not present on the previous screen. This change may be confusing for users as it shifts from a main app interface to a more specific financial summary without clear context.
Touch on a button that has resource_id "adder"

The action of touching the button with resource_id "adder" has transitioned the user from the main screen to the AddOrEdit screen, where new input fields and options for entering financial data are now available, including dropdowns for asset and category selection, as well as text fields for amount and notes. Additionally, a back button has been introduced for navigation back to the previous screen. (page changed from Main to AddOrEdit)
